title: Pintech Collective
description: As a growth engineer, I developed a static site for a robotic automation company that showcases their cutting-edge technology. The site was engineered to drive lead generation and business growth through optimized user experience, performance, and conversion-focused design. Pintech specializes in cutting-edge robotic automation systems, revolutionizing industries with advanced technology and efficient solutions.
technologies: NextUI, Vercel, FramerMotion, S3, TypeScript, TailWind

title: Runners Unidos
description: As a growth engineer, I built a full-stack web application to serve as an information hub for a local running club in Dallas, Texas. The site was engineered to grow community engagement by providing easy access to schedules, events, and member resources. By combining technical development with community growth objectives, the platform helps keep our running community connected and engaged.
technologies: NextUI, Vercel, FramerMotion, AWS: RDS & S3, TypeScript, TailWind

title: VidaBevidasProject
description: As a growth engineer, I developed a comprehensive, full-stack booking platform for a mobile bartender service. The site was engineered to drive business growth through optimized conversion funnels, featuring a professional video showcasing the client's expertise and written reviews to build trust. The booking system integrates Prisma + MongoDB + NodeMailer to streamline customer acquisition and automate email communications, translating technical implementation into measurable business growth.
technologies: NextUI, Vercel, DaisyUI, FramerMotion, AWS, TypeScript, TailWind, Prisma, MongoDB, NodeMailer

title: Leal Directory
description: As a growth engineer, I built a private, full-stack vehicle maintenance tracking application for my family. While internal-facing, the application demonstrates growth engineering principles through optimized user experience, automated workflows, and data-driven insights. Built with Next.js and NextAuth, the app solves real business problems by preventing forgotten service dates and reducing vehicle maintenance costs through proactive tracking and reminders.
technologies: NextUI, Vercel, DaisyUI, FramerMotion, AWS, TypeScript, TailWind, Prisma, MongoDB, NextAuth
